divs: sighting detailsat the time my parents were avid ufo hunters they had many experiences and had ordered ufo detector plans from project starlight(still have the plans)on the night in question the ran inside and hid under the beds and my older brother and father stayed and watched longer and the disk went over my yard and father and brother and kept going about 300 feet over to the edge of the cometary and turned around went back over them and returned to its other ship and casually left then after my father and brother came back inside me and my middle brother went back outside to see if we could still see the ship and it was gone and at that time three army jets in a triangular formation from the direction of fort devens flue over the house and us at tree top level so we know they
